comment: A victim should not be punished!
commentable_entity.title: Warner Bros! Bring Back Depp!
commentable_entity.description:
Warner Brothers, 

A movie is like a car, the cast is the engine, the driving force if you will! Look after the engine, oil it, feed it, shower it with TLC, and it can run forever.....Remove a major part (JD) and the engine will falter. This is the reason 'Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore' has faltered... The engine is broken, fix it and you will once again be on your merry way!

Johnny Depp was asked to resign his role as 'Gallert Grindelwald' over accusation made against him. He tried to defend himself, but lost the case as his opposition 'Amber Heard' lied under oath! Amber has now given the same examples in two trials and yet the details changed quite dramatically. 

We are almost at the end of the 2018 op-ed defamation trial between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard in Virginia USA. We have seen evidence upon evidence from all different walks of life, including those of police officers exposing Amber's lies and Johnny's innocence. 

I believe that Depp is owed an apology from Warner Brothers for asking him to resign when they didn't do that with Heard. However, Johnny being the guy he is, graciously accepted the consequences and stepped down. Now that the truth is out and we can see that Johnny was innocent all along, please can you (Warner Brothers) beg forgiveness and ask Johnny to reprise his role? It's what the fans want!

Are you not a entertainment company, here to help tell a story and entertain us? Then listen to what we (the fans) want to see and show us...

Johnny may have been difficult on set at times, or arriving late or a whole manner of things, he has been going through a lot, of course it would drive him to hit the alcohol and substances harder! He was dealing with abuse in a relationship for years and then the fallout from the aftermath of the divorce, the rumours, and then the suing! He has had it hard, he needs a break! He needs the opportunity to stand back up and show everyone that he can come out the other side and still be great!

Justice is finally coming for Johnny Depp, please allow there to be a 'career' justice for him too!

 

Let Johnny stand once more!
